metadata.title: Maach Paturi | মাছ পাতুরি | Bengali Recipe
metadata.description: Maach Paturi (মাছ পাতুরি) is a traditional Bengali fish recipe featured on the Rural Recipes YouTube channel. In this video, Geeta Shil prepares Desi Tangra fish paturi using banana leaves and traditional rural cooking methods, showcasing village life, indigenous techniques, and authentic Bengali flavors.
